2 gold peaches? miss carrie sez "NO!"
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Items: 2 gold peaches? miss carrie sez "NO!"
By torey_luvullo on Tuesday, April 18, 2000 - 05:59 am:

I just want to know if you can use two golden peaches on one monster for an even longer prime. Thanks.

-- Mast Traina (tung2@earthlink.net), February 08, 2000
Answers
You can only use one gold peach and one silver peach per monster. You get the silver peach at the Elder's Cup tournament after your monster is 6yr3m old.

-- Miss Carrie (musicality1@earthlink.net), February 08, 2000.
